sentences.sentence: I left the office on account of the discontinuance of the business.
sentences.translation: 本人离职的原因，系因该公司即将倒闭。

sentences.sentence: I left the office on account of the discontinuance of the business.
sentences.translation: 小的离职的原因，系因该公司即将倒闭。

sentences.sentence: The limitation period for arbitration shall be calculated anew from the time of discontinuance.
sentences.translation: 从中断时起，仲裁时效期间重新计算。
